name: Rings Linking
description:
A highly addictive puzzle game.

Game Rule:
- Link 3 or more same color elements together.

Normal Mode:
- Fill up all 4 bars will go to next level.
- Game Time = 60 +(level-1) + previous level remain time
- Time up will be game over

90s Mode:
- Each game will have 90s, get the score as highest as you can
